#/lua command description

= Introduction =

[http://code.google.com/p/tfs-mods/source/browse/trunk/command-lua.xml /lua command] allows you to easily execute lua code inside game window.

= Example usage =

  * _/lua return 3 + 3_
  * _/lua return getPlayersOnline()_
  * _/lua doSendMagicEffect(pos, 33)_
